title: A sign of hypocrisy | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: what is that makes them stand out in a crowd it's their hatred to islam and sometimes it's so overwhelming that they cannot hold it back allah says that is because they detest what allah has revealed so he has rendered their deeds void whenever you detest whenever you hate something from allah's laws from allah's religion from allah when you have this feeling of not complying with it not being in sync with the sharia this is a huge major sign of hypocrisy
